creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
Whenever I attempt to set an attribute in my TLD on Windows NT I get the following error at runtime:

javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagAttributeInfo: method (Ljava/lang/String;ZLjava/lang/String;Z)V not found

If I use the exact same TLD, JSP, and class file on Windows 98 everything works fine. This problem even occurs with the examples that ship with Tomcat.

Works fine in 3.2.  I don't know if this a problem that got fixed or not, but 
it works OK now.
creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
